workshoptitle: Develop Python Web Apps with Oracle Autonomous Database Low-code REST APIs

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction for this workshop; provides a brief overview of what to expect.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Walk-through of Flask application and Oracle REST APIs
tutorials.description: This Lab will open the Flask application and step through, while also discussing Oracle REST API capabilities

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Oracle REST API deeper dive
tutorials.description: We review Oracle REST APIs in this Workshop in a Swagger Editor session.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Review the Python and Oracle REST API relationship
tutorials.description: We review the Python application and its relationship with the provided Oracle REST APIs

tutorials.title: Lab 4: A Bootstrap and JavaScript primer
tutorials.description: We review the Bootstrap and JavaScript that is included in this Flask application.

tutorials.title: A word on security
tutorials.description: We introduce the concept of the OAuth2 2.0 security protocol, and how it can benefit our Flask application.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
